main_definition: Trouble refers to difficulties, problems, or disturbances that cause inconvenience or discomfort.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Problems and difficulties in life or work
meanings_and_examples.example: He's been having a lot of trouble at his new job.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To bother, disturb, or annoy someone
meanings_and_examples.example: Please don't trouble yourself with my problems.
They had a passionate time in bed last night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unrest, conflict or violence within a group of people
meanings_and_examples.example: The riots caused significant trouble for the residents of the neighborhood.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To complicate something; to create additional problems
meanings_and_examples.example: Don't make any trouble by arguing with your boss.
